info.name: signhex
info.description:
# signhex API Collection

The signhex API provides a comprehensive set of endpoints for managing digital signage networks, including user management, device pairing, screen scheduling, media uploads, notifications, audit logs, and more. This collection is designed to help developers onboard quickly and efficiently, with organized folders for each major resource and workflow. Authentication, error handling, and common patterns are demonstrated throughout. Use this collection to:

- Authenticate and manage users
- Pair and monitor devices
- Schedule and publish content
- Upload and manage media assets
- Track audit logs and system events
- Handle notifications and emergency events
- Integrate with webhooks and SSO

**Base URL:** Set the `baseURL` variable in your environment to point to your API instance.

**Authentication:** Most endpoints require an `authToken` (see Auth folder for login/logout flows).

**Best Practices:**
- Use environment variables for sensitive data and configuration.
- Review folder-level documentation for endpoint groupings and use cases.
- Refer to request-level descriptions for required parameters and typical workflows.

For more details, see the documentation for each folder and request.

item.name: Auth
item.description: Authentication endpoints for user login, logout, and retrieving the current authenticated user. Use these endpoints to obtain and manage authentication tokens required for other API requests.

item.name: Users
item.description: User management endpoints for creating, updating, deleting, and listing users. Includes user invitations, activation, and password reset workflows.

item.name: Screens
item.description: Endpoints for managing screens, including creation, updates, deletion, and listing of screens and screen groups.

item.name: Media
item.description: Media management endpoints for uploading, listing, retrieving, and deleting media assets. Supports presigned upload URLs and completion confirmation.

item.name: Department
item.description: Department management endpoints for creating, updating, listing, and deleting departments within the organization.

item.name: Schedules
item.description: Endpoints for creating, updating, listing, and publishing schedules. Includes management of schedule targets and publish history.

item.name: Audit Log
item.description: Audit log endpoints for retrieving system activity logs and details for compliance and monitoring purposes.

item.name: Emergency
item.description: Emergency management endpoints for triggering, clearing, and monitoring emergency events and their history.

item.name: Notifications
item.description: Notification endpoints for listing, marking as read, and deleting notifications. Supports both bulk and individual notification management.

item.name: Presentations
item.description: Endpoints for creating, updating, listing, retrieving, and deleting presentations. Supports presentation lifecycle management.

item.name: Device Pairing
item.description: Device pairing endpoints for generating, completing, and listing device pairing codes. Used to securely onboard new devices to the network.

item.name: Device Telemetry
item.description: Device telemetry endpoints for reporting device status, uploading screenshots, sending heartbeats, and acknowledging commands.

item.name: Proof of Play(analytics)
item.description: Proof of play analytics endpoints for retrieving playback data, exporting reports, and filtering by screen, media, or date.

item.name: Requests / Tickets
item.description: Endpoints for creating, updating, listing, and commenting on support requests or tickets.

item.name: Conversations (1:1 messaging)
item.description: Endpoints for managing 1:1 conversations, including starting threads, sending messages, listing threads, and marking messages as read.

item.name: Webhooks (admin)
item.description: Webhooks management endpoints for creating, updating, deleting, listing, and testing webhooks for event-driven integrations.

item.name: SSO config(admin)
item.description: Endpoints for configuring Single Sign-On (SSO) settings, including upserting, listing, and deactivating SSO configurations.

item.name: Settings (admin)
item.description: Settings management endpoints for retrieving and upserting application-wide configuration settings.

item.name: Metrics & Reports
item.description: Endpoints for retrieving metrics and reports, including dashboard overviews, summary reports, and trend analytics.

item.name: API Keys (admin)
item.description: API key management endpoints for creating, listing, and rotating API keys for secure programmatic access.
